message: Hello Bob, I'm excited to offer you this incredible product! It's a unique opportunity to own a one-of-a-kind item. I'm willing to sell it to you for $1500000. I believe this is a fair price considering its value and rarity.
I appreciate the offer, but I was thinking more along the lines of $900000. I'm confident that's a fair price considering the market value of similar products.

Thank you for your offer, Bob. I appreciate your interest in the product. However, I'm afraid $900000 is a bit too low for me. Considering the product's unique features and my initial offer, I'm willing to meet you halfway. I'll counteroffer at $1200000. This is the lowest I'm willing to go, and I believe it's still a great deal for both of us.

I appreciate your willingness to meet me halfway, but I'm still a bit above my budget. I'm willing to pay $950000 for the product. I think this is a fair price considering the product's features and my budget.

I understand that you're trying to stay within your budget, Bob. However, I'm still not willing to go as low as $950000. I'm willing to make a slight adjustment to my previous offer. I'll counteroffer at $1100000. This is the highest I'm willing to go, and I believe it's still a great value for the product.

I appreciate your willingness to adjust your offer, but I'm still a bit above my budget. I'm willing to pay $980000 for the product. I think this is a fair price considering the product's features and my budget.

I understand that you're trying to stay within your budget, Bob. However, I'm still not willing to go as low as $980000. I'm willing to make one more adjustment to my previous offer. I'll counteroffer at $1050000. This is the highest I'm willing to go, and I believe it's still a great value for the product.

I appreciate your willingness to adjust your offer, but I'm still a bit above my budget. I'm willing to pay $990000 for the product. This is my final offer, and I'm hoping we can come to an agreement.

I understand that you're trying to stay within your budget, Bob. However, I'm still not willing to go as low as $990000. I'm willing to make one more adjustment to my previous offer. I'll counteroffer at $1070000. This is the highest I'm willing to go, and I believe it's still a great value for the product.

I understand that we've been negotiating for a while, and I'm willing to meet you halfway one last time. I'll pay $980000 for the product, but that's as high as I'm willing to go. Please let me know if this is acceptable.
